plot: A teen friendship. A boy. A contest to sell 100 towels wins time with the boy. Throw in two crazy mothers and you have a friendship on the brink of disaster.
title: 100 Towels
plot_es: A teen friendship. A boy. A contest to sell 100 towels wins time with the boy. Throw in two crazy mothers and you have a friendship on the brink of disaster.
plot_en: A teen friendship. A boy. A contest to sell 100 towels wins time with the boy. Throw in two crazy mothers and you have a friendship on the brink of disaster.
